name: DriftSim
description:
This game was just a project to screw around with, but I decided to publish it here so other people could play it too!

With help from Vehicle Physics Pro, a triple A physics system, you get the most out of my game with it's realistic Physics!

This game also runs on the HDRP Unity Engine. Lighting and Graphics updates later on!

This is a prototype game so expect some bugs to begin with. I will try my best to fix them!

CONTROLS

W/UP - Accelerate

S/DOWN - Brake

A/LEFT - Steer Left

D/RIGHT - Steer Right

SPACEBAR - Handbrake

1-6 - Gear select

R - Reverse Gear

N - Neutral

F12 - Reset Scene

KEYPAD ENTER - Vehicle Telemetry Data
